hero.name: Gabriel Caetano
hero.title: Full Stack Developer | AI & LLM Specialist
hero.introduction: Software Engineering student at UniCesumar with a strong analytical background from the finance sector. I focus on building scalable full-stack applications, merging the efficiency of the JavaScript ecosystem (React, Node.js, TypeScript) with the innovation of Artificial Intelligence (RAG/LLMs). I strive to turn technical challenges into solutions that deliver real-world impact.

metrics.title: Impact & Results
metrics.perfDesc: 40% optimization in search and filtering on the SBR Imóveis platform.
metrics.autoDesc: 30% reduction in manual operations in the Salon App via AI integration.
metrics.timeDesc: 5 hours of administrative time saved weekly on the Uneagro portal.

ai_showcase.title: AI Architecture: RAG Specialist
ai_showcase.subtitle: Beyond prompts. I build the infrastructure that makes AI accurate, secure, and business-ready.
ai_showcase.step1Desc: Extraction and cleaning of raw data (schedules and preferences).
ai_showcase.step2Desc: Converting text into vectors for semantic search in Vector DBs.
ai_showcase.step3Desc: Real-time context retrieval to power the LLM prompt.
ai_showcase.step4Desc: Generation of accurate and personalized responses for the end user.

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.eduDesc: Focus on system architecture and full-stack development at UniCesumar.
experience.devDesc: Developing AI solutions and high-performance applications for real-world clients.
experience.finDesc: Analytical mindset and process management at Construtora Planespaço.

projects.sbr_desc: High-performance real estate platform with optimized search algorithms (40% speed gain).
projects.salon_desc: Smart RAG-integrated system for automated scheduling, reducing 30% of operational workload.
projects.uneagro_desc: Administrative management and agricultural mapping focused on productivity (5h saved/week).
